channel.title: [PI] Curses Interface
channel.description: First off, I am not sure if this is only server-sided. I ripped the curses etc from DSPK. My problem is that using curses doesn't drain prayer points. I am pretty sure the method for curse draining is added. The other problem is that when you switch to curses, your prayer level in the prayer interface goes to 99/99. I can provide any files/images you might need to help.

item.title: [PI] Curses Interface
